short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides or shows the ZenDesk chat bubble

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This little extension allows a user to hide or show the Zendesk chat bubble in the bottom right of the screen with a simple click. This can be handy for those times the chat is blocking access to important actions on the site where it is used.
